states.name: Indication for RT after BCS given

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Radiotherapy reduces the relative risk of local recurrence to approx. 1/3 - 1/4 in recent studies. The most important risk factor for local recurrence is not undergoing adjuvant radiotherapy. The reduction in the absolute risk is therefore dependent on the overall risk constellation.
In meta-analyses with a long follow-up period, improved local control leads to an improvement in survival if the risk constellation is correspondingly high.

criterion.name: Performed surgery

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Angabe, welche Operation durchgeführt wurde.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the performed surgery of the breast cancer patient. The possible answers are ‘breast conserving surgery’ and ‘mastectomy’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for 'performed surgery' is '

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Postoperative radiotherapy of the chest wall after mastectomy reduces the risk of locoregional recurrence and improves overall survival in locally advanced and node-positive breast carcinomas.
The reduction in the absolute risk is in turn dependent on the overall risk constellation.​

criterion.name: Pathological T-stage
criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the pT-Stage of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘pT1’, ‘pT2’, ‘pT3’, ‘pT4’, ‘pTis’, ‘pT0’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘pT-Stage’ is '

criterion.name: Pathological N-stage
criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the cN-Stage of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘pN0’, ‘pN1’, ‘pN2’, ‘pN3’, ‘pN0(i+)’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘pN-Stage’ is '

criterion.name: R

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Resektionsstatus des Tumors.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the R (resection)-Stage of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘R0’, ‘R1’, ‘R2’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘R-Stage’ is '

criterion.name: LVI

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob eine lymphovaskuläre Invasion vorliegt.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the lymphovascular (LVI) status of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘pos’ for positive and ‘neg’ for negative. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘LVI’ is '

criterion.name: G

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Grading (Differenzierungsgrad) des Tumors.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the G-Stage of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘G1’, ‘G2’, ‘G3’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘G-Stage’ is '

criterion.name: Menopausal status

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob die Patientin prä- oder postmenopausal ist.
(Anmerkung: ab >55 years wird Status automatisch auf postmenopausal gesetzt)

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the menopausal status of the patient. The possible answers are ‘premenopausal’ and ‘postmenopausal’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for 'menopausal status' is '

criterion.name: Number of positive lymph nodes

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Anzahl der befallenen Lymphknoten (= Anzahl der Lymphknotenmetastasen).​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the number of positive lymph nodes / number of lymph node metastases of the breast cancer disease. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘number of lymph node metastases’ is '

criterion.name: Number of positive sentinel lymph nodes

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Anzahl der befallenen Sentinel-Lymphknoten.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the number of positive sentinel lymph nodes / number of lymph node metastases of the breast cancer disease. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘number of sentinel lymph node metastases’ is '

criterion.name: Positive sentinel lymph node

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob ein Befall des/der Sentinel-Lymphknoten vorliegt.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about whether or not the sentinel lymph node of the breast cancer disease is positive. The possible answers are ‘yes’ and ‘no’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘positive sentinel lymph node?’ is '

criterion.name: Her2/neu receptor status

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Der HER2/neu-Rezeptorstatus bei Mammakarzinom (Brustkrebs) gibt an, ob die Krebszellen übermäßig viele HER2/neu-Rezeptoren haben. HER2 (Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2) ist ein Protein, das das Zellwachstum steuert. Ein positiver HER2/neu-Status bedeutet, dass der Krebs wahrscheinlich aggressiver ist, aber auch auf spezifische Therapieoptionen wie Anti-HER2-Antikörper (z.B. Trastuzumab) anspricht. Ein negativer Status bedeutet, dass diese Therapieoptionen wahrscheinlich nicht wirksam wären.
Üblicherweise wird der Her2/neu-Status mittel IHC bestimmt. Ein Wert von 0 oder 1+ ist negativ. Ein Wert von 2+ zweifelhaft und ein Wert von 3+ gilt als positiv.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the Her2/neu receptor status of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘pos’ for positive and ‘neg’ for negative. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘Her2/neu receptor status’ is '

criterion.name: ER

subConditionalStrings.text:
​​Der Östrogen-Rezeptorstatus gibt an, ob die Krebszellen Rezeptoren für das Hormon Östrogen besitzen oder nicht. Ein positiver Östrogen-Rezeptorstatus bedeutet, dass der Krebs auf Östrogen anspricht und mit Hormontherapie behandelt werden kann. Ein negativer Status weist darauf hin, dass Hormontherapie wahrscheinlich unwirksam ist. Üblicherweise gilt ein Brustkrebs als Östrogenrezeptor-positiv (ER+), 
wenn mindestens 1% der untersuchten Krebszellen Östrogenrezeptoren 
aufweisen.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the estrogen receptor status of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘pos’ for positive and ‘neg’ for negative. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘estrogen receptor status’ is '

criterion.name: PR

subConditionalStrings.text:
​​​​​​​​​​​​Der Progesteron-Rezeptorstatus gibt an, ob die Krebszellen Rezeptoren für das Hormon Progesteron haben oder nicht. Ein positiver Status bedeutet, dass die Krebszellen Progesteron-Rezeptoren haben und daher potenziell auf Hormontherapien ansprechen könnten. Ein negativer Status zeigt an, dass die Krebszellen none Progesteron-Rezeptoren haben und somit weniger wahrscheinlich auf Hormontherapie ansprechen. Üblicherweise gilt ein Brustkrebs als Progesteronrezeptor-positiv (PR+), 
wenn mindestens 1% der untersuchten Krebszellen Progesteronrezeptoren 
aufweisen.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the progesteron receptor status of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘pos’ for positive and ‘neg’ for negative. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘progesteron receptor status’ is '

criterion.name: Ki-67

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Der Ki-67-Status ist ein Maß für die Proliferationsrate der Krebszellen und dient als prognostischer sowie teilweise prädiktiver Marker. Ein hoher Ki-67-Wert weist auf schneller wachsende Tumorzellen hin und ist in der Regel mit einer aggressiveren Krankheit und schlechteren Prognose assoziiert. Ein niedriger Wert deutet auf ein langsamer wachsendes Tumorverhalten hin.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the Ki-67 status of the breast cancer disease. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. The unit is ‘%’. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘Ki-67’ is '

criterion.name: Number of resected lymph nodes

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Anzahl der resezierten Lymphknoten (sowohl befallene als auch nicht befallene).​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the number of resected lymph nodes of the breast cancer disease. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘number of resected lymph nodes’ is '

criterion.name: Systemic therapy given

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​​Angabe, ob eine Chemotherapie durchgeführt wurde und wenn yes ob neoadjuvant oder adjuvant.​​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about a systemic therapy given to the breast cancer patient. The possible answers are ‘neoadjuvant’, ‘adjuvant’ and ‘none’. If it seems that no systemic therapy was given the answer is ‘none’. If the answer really cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘systemic therapy given’ is '

criterion.name: Tumor location

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe der Tumorlage (lateral, medial oder zentral).​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the tumor location of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘lateral’, ‘central’ and ‘medial’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘tumor location’ is '

criterion.name: Clinical T-stage
criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the cT-Stage of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘cT1’, ‘cT2’, ‘cT3’, ‘cT4’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘cT-Stage’ is '

states.name: Indication for RT after neoadjuvant therapy

subConditionalStrings.text: ​After primary (neoadjuvant) systemic therapy, the indication for adjuvant radiotherapy should be based on the pre-therapeutic clinical stage. On the other hand, complete response to neoadjuvant therapy is presumably a strong prognostic factor (randomized data are lacking)​.​

criterion.name: Clinical N-stage
criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the cN-Stage of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘cN0’, ‘cN1’, ‘cN2’, ‘cN3’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘cN-Stage’ is '

subConditionalStrings.text: ​After breast-conserving surgery for DCIS, radiotherapy of the affected breast can generally be offered to reduce the risk of local recurrence.

Adjuvant radiotherapy reduces the risk of local recurrence after breast-conserving therapy by up to 50%, but the benefit for the patient is low if the risk is low (recurrence rate without radiotherapy approx. 1-2%/year with good resection). Although half of the tumour recurrences after DCIS are invasive tumour recurrences, no survival benefit has been shown to date from postoperative radiotherapy of DCIS in several prospective randomized studies with a follow-up of up to 20 years.​

Der Boost des Tumorbettes senkt die lokale Rezidiv-Rate, ohne einen 
signifikanten Überlebensvorteil zu bewirken. Die Reduktion des relativen
 Risikos ist unabhängig vom Alter. Das Verhältnis von Reduktion des 
absoluten Risikos zum Risiko für Fibrose ist bei älteren Patienten 
ungünstiger.​
​Boosting the tumor bed lowers the local recurrence rate without providing a significant survival benefit.​

criterion.name: Age

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Das Alter der Patientin in Yeshren.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the age of the patient. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. The unit is ‘years’. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for 'age' is '

criterion.name: Anti-Her2 therapy

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob eine Anti-Her2-Therapie gestartet wurde oder geplant ist.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about whether or not an anti-her2 therapy was given in the treatment of the breast cancer patient. The possible answers are ‘yes’ and ‘no’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘anti-her2 therapy’ is '

criterion.name: Extensive intratumoral DCIS

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​​Angabe, ob ein ausgedehntes, intra-/peritumorales DCIS vorliegt. Dies spielt u.a. eine Rolle um zu entscheiden, ob eine Boostbestrahlung sinnvoll erscheint.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about whether or not there is an extensive intratumoral DCIS in the primary breast cancer tumor lesion. The possible answers are ‘yes’ and ‘no’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘extensive intratumoral DCIS’ is '

criterion.name: Postresection performed

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob eine Nachresektion erfolgt ist.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about whether or not a postresection was performed in the treatment of the breast cancer patient. The possible answers are ‘yes’ and ‘no’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘postresection performed’ is '

subConditionalStrings.text: ​The reduction in the relative risk is independent of age. The ratio of the reduction in the absolute risk to the risk of fibrosis is less favorable in older patients.​

criterion.name: Focality

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob eine uni- oder multifocale Tumorsituation vorliegt.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the focality of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘unifocal’ and ‘multifocal’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘focality’ is '

criterion.name: ECE

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob eine extrakapsuläre Ausbreitung einer/mehrerer Lymphknotenmetastasen vorliegt.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about whether or not there is an extracapsular extension of a lymph node metastasis of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘yes’ and ‘no’. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘extracapsular extension’ is '

criterion.name: Size of lymph node metastasis

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Der Durchmesser der grössten Lymphknotenmetastase in mm.​ Im Zweifelsfall sollte immer der grösste beschriebene Wert angegeben werden.

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the size of the largest lymph node metastasis of the breast cancer disease. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. The unit is ‘mm’. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘size of the largest lymph node metastasis’ is '

states.name: Ggf. gesamt Level I+II ins ZV

criterion.name: Histology

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, welche Histologie vorliegt.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the histology of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘invasive ductal’ (same as NST) and ‘invasive lobular’. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘histology’ is '

states.name: AGO - hohes Risiko nach Truong et al.
AGO - hohes Risiko nach Shen et al.

subConditionalStrings.text: Eine Partial breastbestrahlung kann bei Patientinnen mit niedrigem Rezidivrisiko durchgeführt werden.​​​​​

criterion.name: BRCA1/2

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Angabe über das Vorhandensein oder Fehlen von Mutationen in den BRCA1- oder BRCA2-Genen. Diese Gene sind normalerweise für die Reparatur von DNA-Schäden verantwortlich. Mutationen in diesen Genen können das Risiko für bestimmte Krebsarten, einschließlich Brustkrebs, signifikant erhöhen. Der BRCA-Status kann durch genetische Tests ermittelt werden und ist wichtig für die Risikoeinschätzung sowie für die Planung der Behandlungsstrategie.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the BRCA1/2 status of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘pos’ for positive and ‘neg’ for negative. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘BRCA1/2’ is '

criterion.name: Resection margins

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Der kleinste Resektionsrand (nach eventuell erfolgter Nachresektion) gemäss pathologischem Befund.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the minimum resection margin of the breast cancer tumor. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. The unit is ‘mm’. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for 'minimum resection margin' is '

criterion.name: Tumor size

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Der maximale Tumordurchmesser in mm.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the tumor size (maximum) of the breast cancer tumor. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. The unit is ‘mm’. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for 'tumor size' is '

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​In dieser Situation ist eine Partial breastbestrahlung nicht primär empfohlen.​
Die adjuvante Bestrahlung der regionalen Lymphabflussgebiete verbessert das krankheitsfreie Überleben und das Gesamtüberleben in Untergruppen von Patientinnen.​
​In this situation, radiotherapy of the axilla is probably not necessary.​
​In this situation, treatment of the axilla appears necessary.
In principle, axillary lymph node dissection (ALND) and axillary radiotherapy (axRT) are equivalent options for T1-2, cN0.​
​In this situation, axillary radiotherapy should include caudal level I and level II. However, if there is pre-existing arm oedema, there is a risk of additional worsening of the symptoms.​
​If possible, a Deep Inspiration Breathhold (DIBH) should be performed during planning to minimize the dose exposure to the heart, LAD and lungs.​

criterion.name: Laterality

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Seitenangabe des Tumors.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the laterality of the breast cancer disease. The possible answers are ‘right’, ‘left’ and ‘both’. If the answer cannot be answered or it is not clear, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘laterality’ is '

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Bolus on scar/risk region in the case of chest wall recurrence and close resection margin to the skin. In the case of skin infiltration (T4), bolus over the entire breast.​

• ​    Cavity: Clip-marked area, seroma, scar (surgical report etc.)
  •     CTV= Cavitiy + 20mm; 5mm cropped at skin surface and 0mm at ribs/muscle
  •     PTV= CTV + 5mm, 3mm cropped to skin surface
​​​Boost (in FB-CT):

•     Cavitiy: Clip-marked area, seroma, scar (surgical report etc.)
  •     CTV: Cavity + 5mm, cropped to 0mm on CTV breast
  •     PTV= CTV + 5mm, 3mm cropped to skin surface​

states.name: Contouring: WBRT/axRT in 1-2 pos SNL without indication for RNI

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​​Whole breast/axRT for 1-2 positive SNL-LK without RNI indication:

•     CTV: area where glandular parts are visible; inclusion of level 1/2 to 5mm below the axillary vein; lateral to thoracic artery, dorsal to ribs/muscle; ensure that tumor bed is completely covered; 5mm cropped to skin surface
  •     PTV= CTV + 5mm, 3mm cropped to skin surface​
​Whole breast:

•     CTV: area where glandular parts are visible, lateral to thoracic artery, dorsal to ribs/muscle; ensure that tumor bed is completely covered; 5mm cropped to skin surface
  •     PTV= CTV + 5mm, 3mm cropped to skin surface​

states.name: Contouring: RT of thoracic wall after mastectomy

subConditionalStrings.text: ​CTV: oriented to the opposite breast, laterally to the thoracic artery, dorsally to the ribs/muscle; ensure that the tumor bed is completely covered; 3 mm cropped to the skin surface; inclusion of the expanders/implants
PTV= CTV + 5mm, 2 mm cropped to skin surface​

• ​    for RNI: includes non-dissected parts of level II-IV -> surgical report/information on planning CT/ information from surgeon if necessary
  •     usually inclusion of n_interpekt/n-L2 cranial to the axillary vein

states.name: Contouring: Inclusion of Mammaria interna region

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Inclusion of the internal mammary lymph nodes;
Fundamental consideration with regard to cardiac secondary diagnoses/risks and simultaneous therapy with trastuzumab as well as possible compliance with the constraints​

criterion.name: Positive Mammaria-interna lymph nodes

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​Angabe, ob ein Befall des Mammaria-Interna-Lymphabflussgebiets vorliegt.​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about whether or not there is a positive lymph node in the mammaria interna region. The possible answers are ‘yes’ and ‘no’. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for ‘positive mammaria interna lymph nodes’ is '

subConditionalStrings.text: ​Es besteht none Indikation für eine adjuvante Radiotherapie eines DCIS nach Mastectomy​​​.​
In dieser Situation sollte eine RT empfohlen werden.

​Luminal-A-Like is a subtype of breast cancer that is characterized by specific molecular properties. It is often oestrogen receptor-positive (ER+) and/or progesterone receptor-positive (PR+), but HER2-negative. This subtype generally has a better prognosis and responds well to hormonal therapy.​

​Luminal-B-Like is a subtype of breast cancer that is characterized by certain molecular and hormonal features. It expresses hormone receptors such as oestrogen or progesterone receptors, but is usually more aggressive than the luminal A type. Luminal B tumors often respond to hormonal therapies, but may also have a poorer prognosis and are more prone to recurrence compared to luminal A tumors. Chemotherapy and other treatment approaches may also be recommended.​

​The HER2-enriched subtype of breast cancer is characterized by overexpression or amplification of the HER2 gene (Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2). This subtype is usually more aggressive and responds well to therapies that target the HER2 receptor, such as trastuzumab.
This molecular subtype typically responds better to chemotherapy than luminal A-like and luminal B-like.​

​The “basal-like” subtype of breast cancer is a subgroup that is characterized by specific molecular features. It is usually triple-negative, i.e. the tumor cells express none hormone receptors (oestrogen and progesterone receptors) and show none overexpression of the HER2 protein. This subtype is considered aggressive and often does not respond well to conventional hormonal therapies. Chemotherapy is currently the main treatment option.​

criterion.name: Life expectancy

subConditionalStrings.text: ​​​Die geschätzte Lebenserwartung der Patientin in years.​​

criterion.regexRule: [INST]The following clinically text possibly contains information about the life expectancy of the patient. If the answer cannot be answered, the value is 'unknown'. The unit is ‘years’. TEXT: [INFO] [/INST] ANSWER: The value for 'life expectancy' is '
